events.name: Western Allies Reject Ukraine's Request for Fighter Jets
events.wd_label: Western Allies Reject Ukraine's Request for Fighter Jets
events.wd_description: After agreeing to send tanks to Ukraine, the US and UK declined Ukraine's request for Western fighter jets, including F-16s, deeming the request impractical and signaling a limit to military support.
events.description: After agreeing to send tanks to Ukraine, the US and UK declined Ukraine's request for Western fighter jets, including F-16s, deeming the request impractical and signaling a limit to military support.

events.name: Rejection of Fighter Jets Request
events.wd_description: The US and UK rejected Ukraine's request for F-16 fighter jets and other Western aircraft, citing practical concerns and signaling a limit to their military support.
events.description: The US and UK rejected Ukraine's request for F-16 fighter jets and other Western aircraft, citing practical concerns and signaling a limit to their military support.

events.name: US and UK Responses
events.wd_description: US President Joe Biden and a spokesperson from Downing Street both confirmed that sending fighter jets to Ukraine was not feasible, with Biden stating "no" to the request for F-16s.
events.description: US President Joe Biden and a spokesperson from Downing Street both confirmed that sending fighter jets to Ukraine was not feasible, with Biden stating "no" to the request for F-16s.

events.name: Ukraine's Request for Fighter Jets
events.wd_description: Following the agreement by the US and Germany to send tanks, Ukraine requested 200 fighter jets, including F-16s, to enhance its defense capabilities against Russia.
events.description: Following the agreement by the US and Germany to send tanks, Ukraine requested 200 fighter jets, including F-16s, to enhance its defense capabilities against Russia.

events.name: Deadly cold weather in Asia
events.wd_description: Extreme cold weather was recorded in several Asian countries, including Japan, China, and the Korean peninsula, leading to fatalities and significant disruptions.
events.description: Extreme cold weather was recorded in several Asian countries, including Japan, China, and the Korean peninsula, leading to fatalities and significant disruptions.

events.name: Japan cold weather
events.wd_description: Deadly cold weather in Japan resulted in fatalities and caused the cancellation of hundreds of domestic flights due to heavy snow and high winds.
events.description: Deadly cold weather in Japan resulted in fatalities and caused the cancellation of hundreds of domestic flights due to heavy snow and high winds.

events.name: Korean peninsula cold weather
events.wd_description: The Korean peninsula experienced cold storms with temperatures dropping as low as -22°F (-30°C), particularly affecting the Pyongyang province.
events.description: The Korean peninsula experienced cold storms with temperatures dropping as low as -22°F (-30°C), particularly affecting the Pyongyang province.

events.name: China cold weather
events.wd_description: China's northernmost city, Mohe, recorded its lowest temperature ever at -63.4°F (-53°C), with significant temperature reductions predicted in several areas.
events.description: China's northernmost city, Mohe, recorded its lowest temperature ever at -63.4°F (-53°C), with significant temperature reductions predicted in several areas.

events.name: Xi Jinping Endorsed for Third Term as President of China
events.wd_label: Xi Jinping Endorsed for Third Term as President of China
events.wd_description: Xi Jinping was officially endorsed for an unprecedented third term as President of China by the country's political elites, making him the longest-serving president since the founding of Communist China in 1949.
events.description: Xi Jinping was officially endorsed for an unprecedented third term as President of China by the country's political elites, making him the longest-serving president since the founding of Communist China in 1949.

events.name: Endorsement of Xi Jinping
events.wd_description: Xi Jinping was officially endorsed for a third term as President of China, solidifying his position as the longest-serving president since 1949.
events.description: Xi Jinping was officially endorsed for a third term as President of China, solidifying his position as the longest-serving president since 1949.

events.name: Ceremonial Vote in Great Hall of the People
events.wd_label: Ceremonial Vote in Great Hall of the People
events.wd_description: Xi Jinping's reappointment as President was confirmed by a unanimous vote of 2,952 during a ceremonial session in Beijing’s Great Hall of the People, followed by a standing ovation.
events.description: Xi Jinping's reappointment as President was confirmed by a unanimous vote of 2,952 during a ceremonial session in Beijing’s Great Hall of the People, followed by a standing ovation.

events.name: Xi Jinping's Role in Communist Party and Military
events.wd_label: Xi Jinping's Role in Communist Party and Military
events.wd_description: Xi Jinping secured his position as the head of the Communist Party and military last fall, roles that hold the real power in China, making his presidential reappointment a formality.
events.description: Xi Jinping secured his position as the head of the Communist Party and military last fall, roles that hold the real power in China, making his presidential reappointment a formality.

events.name: US, DRC, and Zambia Sign MOU on EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_label: US, DRC, and Zambia Sign MOU on EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The United States, Zambia, and the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) in December 2022 to develop an integrated value chain for EV batteries in the DRC and Zambia, aiming to counter China's dominance in critical minerals.
events.description: The United States, Zambia, and the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) in December 2022 to develop an integrated value chain for EV batteries in the DRC and Zambia, aiming to counter China's dominance in critical minerals.

events.name: MOU Announcement
events.wd_description: The MOU aims to facilitate the development of an integrated value chain for EV batteries in the DRC and Zambia, involving cooperation on feasibility studies, technical assistance, and promoting private sector investment.
events.description: The MOU aims to facilitate the development of an integrated value chain for EV batteries in the DRC and Zambia, involving cooperation on feasibility studies, technical assistance, and promoting private sector investment.

events.name: Strategic Goals
events.wd_description: The agreement aims to reduce US reliance on China for critical minerals, support DRC and Zambia's economic and industrial needs, and enhance global supply chain security for EV batteries.
events.description: The agreement aims to reduce US reliance on China for critical minerals, support DRC and Zambia's economic and industrial needs, and enhance global supply chain security for EV batteries.

events.name: Challenges and Considerations
events.wd_description: The MOU faces challenges such as being nonbinding, needing U.S. private sector support, addressing corruption and governance issues in DRC and Zambia, and providing economic and risk incentives for U.S. companies.
events.description: The MOU faces challenges such as being nonbinding, needing U.S. private sector support, addressing corruption and governance issues in DRC and Zambia, and providing economic and risk incentives for U.S. companies.

events.name: Nonbinding Nature of MOU
events.wd_description: The MOU is nonbinding and does not guarantee implementation, as it depends on many factors, including internal U.S. politics and availability of funds.
events.description: The MOU is nonbinding and does not guarantee implementation, as it depends on many factors, including internal U.S. politics and availability of funds.

events.name: Private Sector Support
events.wd_description: The success of the MOU relies on the ability of the U.S. administration to encourage private U.S. companies to invest in the DRC and Zambia, overcoming negative perceptions of the Congolese mining industry.
events.description: The success of the MOU relies on the ability of the U.S. administration to encourage private U.S. companies to invest in the DRC and Zambia, overcoming negative perceptions of the Congolese mining industry.

events.name: Governance Issues
events.wd_description: Addressing corruption and bad governance in the DRC and Zambia's mining sectors requires deep, coherent, and permanent political engagement, which may take time to create an ideal well-governed mining industry.
events.description: Addressing corruption and bad governance in the DRC and Zambia's mining sectors requires deep, coherent, and permanent political engagement, which may take time to create an ideal well-governed mining industry.

events.name: Economic and Risk Incentives
events.wd_description: The Biden administration must provide strong economic and risk incentives for U.S. firms to invest in the DRC and Zambia, addressing business and risk factors.
events.description: The Biden administration must provide strong economic and risk incentives for U.S. firms to invest in the DRC and Zambia, addressing business and risk factors.

events.name: U.S.-China Competition
events.wd_description: The MOU aims to counter China's dominance in the critical mineral supply chain, but it raises questions about the agency of DRC and Zambia and the potential inclusion of Chinese companies in competitive tenders.
events.description: The MOU aims to counter China's dominance in the critical mineral supply chain, but it raises questions about the agency of DRC and Zambia and the potential inclusion of Chinese companies in competitive tenders.
